tool_description: Document Generation API that uses OpenAI to create an example resume when provided the following data: University Name, Degree, and a list of Skills
title: AI Resume Generator

api_list.name: Generate Document: Cover Letter
api_list.description: Endpoint that will generate a large text response containing a Cover Letter document using the provided information

parameters.name: jobDescription
parameters.default: Example Co. is looking for a Full Stack Web Developer to maintain and improve our custom web application. The solutions will require both frontend and backend skills. Our web application runs on a LEMP stack. LEMP stack experience is a bonus, but not required.

utterances.utterance: Create a cover letter for a Full Stack Web Developer position at Example Co. with a degree in Information Systems from Michigan State University.

parameters.jobDescription: Example Co. is looking for a Full Stack Web Developer to maintain and improve our custom web application. The solutions will require both frontend and backend skills. Our web application runs on a LEMP stack. LEMP stack experience is a bonus, but not required.

utterances.utterance: Generate a cover letter for a Software Engineer role with a Computer Science degree from Stanford University, focusing on skills in Python and Java.
I need a cover letter for a Data Analyst position. I have a degree in Statistics from Harvard University and skills in data visualization and SQL.
Draft a cover letter for a Marketing Manager job. I graduated with a Marketing degree from UCLA and have skills in digital marketing and SEO.
Can you create a cover letter for a Graphic Designer role? I studied Graphic Design at Rhode Island School of Design and specialize in Adobe Creative Suite.
Write a cover letter for a Project Manager position. I have a degree in Business Administration from NYU and expertise in Agile methodologies.
I need a cover letter for a Cybersecurity Analyst job. My degree is in Cybersecurity from MIT, and I have skills in network security and threat analysis.
Generate a cover letter for a Human Resources Specialist role. I graduated with a degree in Human Resources from the University of Chicago and have skills in employee relations and recruitment.
Create a cover letter for a Financial Analyst position. I have a Finance degree from Wharton School and skills in financial modeling and analysis.
Draft a cover letter for a Content Writer job. I studied English Literature at Oxford University and have skills in creative writing and editing.

api_list.name: Generate Document: Resume
api_list.description: Endpoint that will generate a large text response containing a Resume document using the provided information

utterances.utterance: Create a resume for a computer science graduate from Stanford University with skills in Python and machine learning.
Generate a resume for someone with a degree in marketing from Harvard University, skilled in SEO and content creation.
I need a resume for an electrical engineering graduate from MIT with expertise in circuit design and embedded systems.
Can you generate a resume for a business administration graduate from the University of Chicago with skills in project management and data analysis?
Create a resume for a software engineering graduate from Carnegie Mellon University with skills in Java and cloud computing.
Generate a resume for a graduate in graphic design from the Rhode Island School of Design with skills in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.
I need a resume for a civil engineering graduate from the University of California, Berkeley with skills in AutoCAD and structural analysis.
Create a resume for a psychology graduate from Yale University with skills in research and counseling.
Generate a resume for a mechanical engineering graduate from Georgia Tech with skills in CAD and thermodynamics.
Can you create a resume for a finance graduate from the Wharton School with skills in financial modeling and investment analysis?
